name: DeleteImageFromBoard
description:
Deletes an image from a Miro board.

Use this tool to delete an image item from a specific Miro board. Ensure you have the 'boards:write' scope permission. This action is rate-limited at Level 3.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) for the board from which the image will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: image_item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the image item to delete from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
